description: Updates the specified voice profile's voice print and refreshes its expiration timestamp.

parameters.name: SpeakerSearchTaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the speaker search task.

nested_items.name: VoiceProfileId
nested_items.description: The ID of the voice profile.

nested_items.name: VoiceProfileArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the voice profile.

nested_items.name: VoiceProfileDomainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the domain that contains the voice profile.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the voice profile was created and enrolled.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which the voice profile was last updated.

nested_items.name: ExpirationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which a voice profile expires unless you re-enroll the caller via the UpdateVoiceProfile API.
